Class MyStoredProgram

Namespace
ASE_Riya_Joshi_77356746
Assembly
ASE_Riya_Joshi_77356746.dll

Represents a stored program that can manage variables, methods, and command execution. This class extends the functionality of the base BOOSE.StoredProgram class.

public class MyStoredProgram : StoredProgram, IList, ICollection, IEnumerable, ICloneable, IStoredProgram
